title: Rano[m] ConverZations: Shari and Nolan
description:
Shari and Nolan have a discussion about poetry, the personal merits of engaging in it specifically versus other forms of the written word, as well as its ability to convey and constitute meaning.

Join the ConverZation here:
https://discord.gg/j8ps92H
